column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We were visiting from out of town and had to try this famous Chicago style pizza Lou's was walking distance. Katie was our server
column2: very polite and efficient. We ordered the spinach stuffed bread not knowing what to expect. It was delicious. We got a medium sized pizza. More than enough for the 2 of us. That cheese was delicious. Im not a fan of the deep dish type crust but non the less the pizza was good and so was the butter crust
